transcript:
Customer: Neengal azhaikkum nabar veroru nabarudan pesikkondu ullar. Neengal kaathirukkalaam allathu sirithu neram kazhithu pinnar azhaikkalaam. Aapne jis vyakti ko call kiya hai, woh abhi doosre call par vyast hai. Kripya
Executive: Hello. Sollunga madam vaanga.
Customer: Ippo sollunga sir.
Customer: Naan unga neenga keattathunaala naan ok intha maari clientku intha issue irukkunnu solli naanga initiate pannurathukkaaga antha concern close pannittu athu further move pannalaam.
Customer: But enna problem naan satisfaction dayavu senji neenga purinjikonga naan satisfaction sonna neenga ethu satisfactiona irukkingala sir appuram yen sir neenga athu opt out kodukkuringannu kodukkirathukku question irukkurathukku vaaippu irukka illaiya madam neenga athai moola purinjikonga ennudaiya conditionai purinjikonga ennaalellaam innuma vanthu day and night athukkaaga work panna mudiyaathu madam naan pala velaiyaa iruppen naan veliyila poi naan vikkurathukku muyarchi panniyaachinnu naan paaththurennunnu naan sonna naan ippo naan ungalitta thavaraa madam solren ithu naan sonnaale explain pannale vaanga maatteengiraanga ithunna naan vanthu onlinela vanthu athai explain panni eppadi athai vanthu pannikka poraanga ok yen yen sir en nilamaiya purinjikonga naan ungalukku onnum solren illa.
Customer: Vera ethume sollillaiyae.
Executive: Illa naanumae athu thappunnu sollala but ungalukku neenga first time payment pannumbothu ungalukitta vanthu IndiaMART service paththi explain panniruppaangalla.
Customer: Onnu madam leadunnu thaan sonnaangalae madam ennaai enakku ithai paththi ennaa theriyumnu ninaikkireenga neenga.
Executive: Illa enna guide pannirunthaanga yennaa namma first meetinglayumae naan guide pannirunthaen ippidithaan work run aagumnu sir enna sollirunthaanga keattirunthom naan ungalitta orae request keakkuren madam leadunnaa enakku enna puththi athai paththi ennaa theriyumnu ninaikkireenga neenga sari ethovo oru information kodukkuraanga namma pathil sollalaam athai convince aavaangannu thaan naan ninaichchittu irunthaen ippo naan vanthu naan solrathu ippa ithai paththi ellaam enakku therinjirunthaannu vechchikkongalaen naan ungalitta vanthu ennaa ethunnu keakka mudiyaathu munnar naan therinjirunthaa thaan madam ennaannu keakka mudiyum ungalitta ippo theriyurathukkae ippidi therinji naan vanthu lead kodukkureenga naan vanthu pathil solren athai ellaam appadiyae nikkuthu athai vittu thiruppi thiruppi koduththuttae irukkuraanga athu vanthu enakku naan time waste pannurathai paththi illa athai appuram naan eththanai naan vaera vaelai paarththu naan athai sense pannurathukku muyarchi pannalaannu thaan naan paakkuren vaera onnum kidaiyaathu ippo vanthu ithu therinjirunthuchinnu vechchikkongalaen sari ippidithaanu enakku therinjirunthuchinnaa naan antha antha valiyai naan paaththuttu poiruppen appo first time varumbothu ungalukku explain pannalaingalaa ippidithaan correctaa run aagumnu lead tharuvaannu mattum thaan sollirunthaanga leadunnaa ennaannae enakku theriyathu yenna vanthu neenga koduppinga neenga avanga sir sonnaanga ithai neenga vanthu naanga sollathaan sir seiyalaam yaaraiyum naanga vanthu convince panniyellaam vaanga solla mudiyaathu appidintaanga athai yaarum seiyamaattaangannu enakku theriyum sirnaannu sollittaen ippo neenga convince panni yaaraiyum vaanga solrathukku vanthu yaaru oththuppaa appidingarathu naanum avangalitta keattaen avanga vanthu ithu naanga ezhuthi vechchikkira productla ulla descriptionai paarththom kodukkura explanationai paarththu thaan vaanguvaangannu ninaichchu thaan naama madam sari ithula vanthu irangalaam vaera vanthu ungalala viruppappattaa ethai venaannaalum paarththu seiyinga madam illa naan vaera onnum requestellaam onnum illa vaera ennaa seiyanumnu neenga yaar maelayum enakku ellaa payamum kidaiyaathu madam nalla satisfactionaathaan work koduththinga enakku vanthu yen nilamai ithaan unga servicekku ellaam naan satisfaction illainnu naan solla vae illa tharaalamaa yaartta venaannaalum neenga sollunga unga servicekku athukku sammantham kidaiyaathu varrappaiyae avanga solraanga lead thaan tharuvaanga sir appinnaanga leadunnaa ennaannu yennaikku theriyathu ippo vanthu paarththavangala thaan enakku theriyuthu ithukkaagavae naan melakkattittu irunthaa aduththa vaelai thaan paakkanum madam ennaala dayavu senji vaenaam naan vaenaa neenga vanthu mudinjaa paarunga madam illannaa neenga appadiyae drop out pannirunga ennaala irukkurathukku mela irukkellaam ithukku mela ennaala melakkattittu irukka mudiyaathu sorry ippadi thaan naan paaththukittu irukkaen sari ok sir intha concern close pannikkalaangalaa ippo athai neenga satisfaction koduththathunaala ippo aduththu engalaala initiate pannavum mudiyaathu ippo intha concern close pannikkalaangalaa yennaa thirumba ungalukku feedback varum ippo naan pesinathukku thaan ungalukku feedback varum illa madam satisfaction koduthaa sir neenga satisfied kodukkirathu naan ippo ungalukitta intha concern paththi discuss pannirkkaen yennaa neenga oru problemnu solli enakku vanthu mail potrukkeenga naan call panni enna problemmo ippo naan pesi irukkaen ok ippo naan naan pesi sollunga sir athuthaan sir neenga oru issue solreenga naan vanthu ungalukitta keakkuren ok ithai ellaam discuss pannirukkom client vanthu not satisfiednu sollittu naan vanthu neenga keakkura maari naan initiate panna porenaa naan first pesinathukku ungalukku feedback varum neenga athula not satisfied koduththingannaa aduththu thirumbavum call varum athukkaaga solren yennaa unga servicekku satisfaction neenga appidi vanthu ippo naan marupadiyum ennaa varattum madam naan satisfiednu koduththuren madam neenga aduththa procedurekku ennaa seiyanumnu seiyinga madam ippo athai close pannikkalaangalaa pannikkalaam madam naan vanthu ippo ungalukkum ithukkum sammantham illai madam naan koduththa ithukku thaan keattaen vaera onnum illa sorry thavaraa illa sir sorryingurathukku illa ippo neenga koduththingannaa athu ennaa problem discuss pannittu thaan naanga athai close pannittu aduththu ethu vanthu ok clientkku intha concern irukku ithai eppidi move on pannalaannu solli naanga athukku furtheraa step edukka mudiyum ok illainnu naan naan mail la koduththirukkumae appuram marupadiyum marupadiyum athai repeat panni sollittae irunthaa athu vanthu irritation aagumnu ninaichchaen madam appidi illa sir ithu ippo pesinathukku naan actually antha client correctaa concern pesi irukkomaannurathukku engaloda feedback varum ok ippo naan pesinathu satisfiedaa thaan varum ok ok sari madam sari thank you sir sari ok sir ithu ippo close pannuren ungalukku paaththukittunnaa ungalukku innum call pannuren sir ok ok ok thank you
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not satisfied with the leads.

- Customer cannot work day and night.

- Customer says that even after explaining, clients don't buy.

- Customer says he is wasting time.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the process of feedback.

- Executive offered to close the concern.



Next Steps: 

- Concern will be closed.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, satisfaction, feedback, concern
